comment: Dr. Braden is an amazing professor.  The assignments were easy, and he was very clear about what he expected.  If he taught any other classes I would be the first to register.
Awesome Teacher Awesome Stories Awesome Guy

He is such a sweet teacher; he really cares about his students. Class is not mandatory but he always has fun stories. He has power points with a lot of statistics which you actually have to study for the tests. I took the hybrid class which I think was just enough class time. I don't know what we would talk about two times a week.

If you are a freshman, I STRONGLY advise you to take Dr. Braden. He is probably one of my favorite college teachers that I have ever had. VERY involved in just being personal with you....he enjoys having his own relationship with all of his classes. Too sweet! He will make you look forward to going to class!!!
Awesome. Easily distracted by football but love his stories that he incorporates with the material. Don't buy the book, i wasted $ on that and we never even opened it. Take him for sure!

I enjoyed this class so much. Easy going, very helpful, always smiling and telling stories about wine, former students, and new toys (technology). GREAT professor, would recommend him for every student at KSU.

Dude's a riot. Always has crazy stories, and i have yet to meet a teacher that can as distracted by college football as he can. But he's awesome, and probably an A. I highly recommend him, he's a ton of fun. I actually enjoy the class.

Prof. Braden is precious and is such a wonderful professor. He is always willing to help and is really on the student's side as far as assignments and such. He is so nice and very clear about what he expects.
He is really easy going.  He knows this class is required and makes the class really easy and fun.  Really cool guy. Take him for sure.
By far the coolest teacher ever. He's so adorable and so funny. Super laid back, just come to class because he takes attendance. Overall, great teacher!!!

TAKE IT = EASY A! Hes a sweet n interesting guy, gives easy assignments always takes late work. Im still not sure even exactly what we have done in this class, but its EASY! Study for tests, ask him questions hes very helpful. SWEET GUY EASY EASY A! just go to class its good way to get better grade. TAKE HIM if you want easy credit!

He is a funny and nice guy. He has the tendency to tell a lot of stories and talk a lot but overall a good class. The key to getting an A is attendence and his powerpoint slides. Make sure you study them very very carefully and listen to everything he says. Would recommend!

Great teacher! Super sweet guy and very interesting. I never once used the book and rarely took notes and got an A. Read the powerpoints and study them carefully..midterm and final were the only tests but they come straight from the slides that he emails you. Grades speeches fairly- just do them his way.

He's an ok teacher. I really felt like he was repetative and he was always saying, "we'll talk about this later." Then we never talked about it. But he's a nice guy and a fair grader when grading speeches. He gives good criticism. It's a good class, and Dr. Braden isn't a bad teacher.

Took an incurably boring class and made it fun to attend. He'll tell that all the crap your high school teachers told you about your college professors not caring is not true and he'll prove it with his attitude. Pay attention and take good notes if you want an A in his class.

so sweet! dr braden is awesome and so helpful. he truly cares about his students and is a great professor. he gives a lot of extra credit, although his tests are a little tricky sometimes. take this class for an easy A! nicest teacher you'll have!

Braden is a great teacher. Down to earth, funny, and always willing to help. He always has a new story to tell about someone he knows- class dragged sometime with the notes, but he's great. Tests are multiple choice, true false and short answer. Striaght from the book. A few one page papers- nothing hard. TAKE HIM! :) :)

Very goofy and interesting character, I wish I could take him for all my comm classes. Tests are somewhat tricky towards the end of the semester, but he has always given 5-10 extra points for each one because he knows some of the ?'s were confusing. Take good notes on his powerpoint. Not alot of grades, so study for the tests and get an easy A!!!

Dr. Braden is so cool. He tells a LOT of stories which helps if you're an auditory learner. His tests can be a little tricky but they're multiple choice and T/F. He definately knows what he's talking about and while a lot of stuff is common sense you'll still learn something from him. make sure you really prepare for your speech tho. Only 5 grades
SO COOL!

he really wants students to do well.he is a big help, always in a good mood and always willing to help. as long as you pay attn, take notes/review-he tells you what to study and what will be on the tests.....EASY A!!!! no KIDDING! GR8 TEACHER YOU GUYS! i HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!

Prof. Braden is always very friendly and nice. He communicates with the class very well. Our whole class likes him, and he is very understanding of the fact that we have a lot of schoolwork to keep up with. Sometimes I think he is a little too nice and easy on us. He's a great person.
Fun and easy going class. Tests are easy, and if you read textbook and take good notes, you will get an A.
